title: Training Stress - The good & the bad
description: TSS stands for training stress and is like a seatbelt, as it helps keep you safe and improve your performance as intensity rises.

transcript.full_text: what is TSS TSS is like a seat belt as a definition TSS represents training stress proper TSS management helps keep you safe as well as improve your performance as intensity Rises training stress goes up exponentially be careful when increasing intensity if you overdo it you can lower your immunity and Bam you just want a mini vacation from training there is a relationship between weekly average TSS and performance the exact mathematical relationship is questionable don't try to substitute intensity for duration TSS is much better as a seat belt than a gas pedal
